FY.video: Here is a video of typical winter weather at McMurdo Station in Antarctica, which has an FY climate: Antarctica Condition 1 Weather

Cc1.video: Footage of Heard Island. The green coastal areas have a Cc1 climate, one of the rarest climates on earth. The average refrigerater could be said to have a Cc1 "climate": Heard Island 2012 visit
